ygData.subject: Attempting to Power Smith this skill....
ygData.msgSnippet: Well after crossing 17th with my HighElf Paladin I have decided to pickup smithing. I have journeyed to Freeport as it seems to have everything I need to get
ygData.messageBody:
Well after crossing 17th with my HighElf Paladin I have decided to pickup smithing.

I have journeyed to Freeport as it seems to have everything I need to get the job done.

So, starting with a skill of 10 I have advanced to 25, making bits and turning it into
skewers.

I have spent about 40p so far, and have another 120p that I am willing to invest.

My question is, do I just keep attempt skewers? Or should I attempt something else
to raise my skill? Skewers seem to be the most cost effective....

Once I run out of cash I will journey home, spend a few days and come back with another
100-200p to invest. So far it seems to average 3pp per points... anyone else have some figures on this?

Archonon - Rathe - High Elf Paladin 17th Circle

http://www.archonon.com/everquest
(if you want to see a lot of pictures - like 400 or so)


Chris

Eagles may soar, but weasels don't get sucked into jet engines.

www.archonon.com
